name: One Such As Me
description:
I wish I could have committed more time to this project but it was a lot of fun working with a cool group and a great learning experience!

For the best experience, use a controller.

Controls - Keyboard/Controller

Run - Arrow Keys/Left Stick

Jump - Space/A

Attack - W/X

Block - Q/Left Trigger

Dialog Confirm - B/B

Exit Game - Alt+F4

Credits:

3d Art/Programming/Game Design - Bryan Hazzard

Composer - Payton Petkus

https://itch.io/profile/paytonpetkus

Level Design - Mathew Hazzard

Narrative Designer - Chris Vella 

https://chris-v.itch.io/
